attributes.action: pledge that never again will the UK government seek to ban entry to the UK to those who are entitled, or to limit free speech in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, petition the UK government for:-

- Geert Wilders to enjoy free entry to and travel within the UK as is his right
- A full apology to be issued to Mr. Wilders, to the Dutch government, and to the UK and Dutch peoples from the Home Secretary
- A pledge to be issued that never again will the UK government seek  to ban entry to the UK to those who are entitled, or to limit free speech in the UK
- An enquiry into the Lord Ahmed debacle which preceded the Home Secretary making this terrible decision

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
